pageSubtitle: Register your Sigma PPF installation for comprehensive warranty coverage

benefits.title: 7-Year Coverage

importantNotes: Warranty registration must be completed within 30 days of installation
Original purchase invoice required for claims
Installation must be performed by authorized detailers
Regular maintenance as per guidelines required
Physical damage and improper care not covered
